column4: why is it that one application can take down my entire desktop?
i mean one process just caused me to have to do a control_alt_backspace
VirtualBox brought my entire desktop to a grinding halt because a process in the virtual machine went crazy
why is it able to do that?
no idea.  did you try a kill -9 ?
i couldnt get to a terminal :|
the entire screen was completely unresponsive
ya that happens to me sometimes when playing cs on WINE.
maybe it's freezing up a kernel module
oh i think i know what it was
it ran out of memory in the virtual machine
and the caused a kernel module to go nutz adding to the disk
how'd you come to realize that?
because its the only thing that made sense in the slightest
